revised_title: Eyam Edge Earthquake of 1755: A Detailed Account
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the earthquake that occurred in the lead mines of Eyam Edge, Derbyshire, in 1755. The author, Wm. Bullock, describes the effects of the earthquake on the mines and the surrounding area, as well as the experiences of the miners who were working at the time. The article also includes a description of the aftermath of the earthquake, including the fires that broke out and the subsequent destruction of the city.
